SQL_STMT_U.val: select isn, name1 from eo where eo_type = 2284 and isn in (select eo2_isn from relations where (eo1_isn = :1 and relation_type = 2717) or (eo1_isn =:2 and relation_type = 2716))

Text.val: should be linked to an event or an entity
dynamically set various attributes dependant on pass type ie ticket, admission, coupon
**button is only enabled where no passes have been generated
